basics.name: Not Provided
basics.label: Middle School Principal
basics.summary: To obtain the job that continues to expand my administrative experience working with staff, students, and parents to develop a shared vision and leading school community in achieving those goals. Believes that all children deserve to have every opportunity to learn in a positive, supportive environment. A firm believer in habits of mind, modeling expectations, positive relationships, and transparency.

work.name: Not Provided
work.summary: Supervised and evaluated certified and non-certified staff. Implemented a pilot program from the MCEE for a new staff evaluation model. Ensured accountability for meeting legal expectations for students with an IEP, 504, Title I services, or at-risk services.
highlights: Supervised general and specialized education teachers
Implemented The Thoughtful Classroom Teacher Evaluation System
Principals' NCLB and Title I Boot Camp
Extensive training in best instructional practices in the classroom
Using data to drive instruction in the classroom
Professional Development in becoming a successful building leader in education.

work.name: Not Provided
work.summary: Evaluated certified and non-certified staff. Supervised multiple extra-curricular activities for middle school students.
highlights: Assisted in planning and implementing transition activities
Handled student and staff disciplinary issues

work.name: Not Provided
work.summary: K-12 Career Preparation Coordinator. Coordinator of HS At-Risk Programming. Freshmen Class Advisor.

work.name: Not Provided
work.summary: School Improvement Team Committee Chairperson. OEA Negotiating Team member.
